lead_paragraph: The Bears have surprised a lot of fans this season, maybe even Chicago fans. So I asked one of our regular commenters, Hal from Chicago, about the view from the top of the N.F.C North. He wrote:
snippet: Bears fans enter that part of the season in which the team plays with our minds and hearts by cruelly offering something akin to actual hope for the postseason.
